title: Famous Places
description: Explore the most famous places in Braj, each with its own unique history and significance.

places.name: Vrindavan
places.description: A sacred town known for its temples and association with Lord Krishna.

places.name: Mathura
places.description: The birthplace of Lord Krishna, rich in cultural heritage.

places.name: Govardhan Hill
places.description: A sacred hill revered in Hindu mythology.
